summary: A private deadly feud ensues when ruthless wealthy rancher Will Isham attempts a takeover of small rancher Owen Merritt's land and marries Owen's old flame, Laurie Bidwell.
cast: Randolph Scott|Joan Leslie|Ellen Drew|Alexander Knox|Richard Rober|John Russell|Alfonso Bedoya|Guinn 'Big Boy' Williams|Clem Bevans|Cameron Mitchell|Richard Crane|Frank Sully|Ada Adams|Don Beddoe|Bob Burns|Roydon Clark|Jimmy Dime|Frank Ellis|Tennessee Ernie Ford|Joe Garcio|Curley Gibson|Herman Hack|Frank Hagney|Al Haskell|Reed Howes|James Kirkwood|George Lloyd|Jim Mason|David O. title: Lucha a muerte
